source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
CAST(a.TDLinx_number__c as nvarchar(100)) as [TDLINX],
CAST(a.SGWS_number__c as nvarchar(100)) as [SGWS_NUM],
CAST(a.[Name] as nvarchar(150)) as [ACCOUNT_NAME], 
CAST(a.ShippingStreet as nvarchar(150)) as [ADDRESS],
CAST(a.ShippingCity as nvarchar(150)) as [CITY],
CAST(a.ShippingState as nvarchar(5)) as [STATE],
CAST(u.Discipline__c as nvarchar(150)) as [DISCIPLINE_NAME],
CAST(a.ShippingPostalCode as nvarchar(50)) as [ZIP],
CAST(a.Account_Status__c as nvarchar(50)) as [ACTIVE]
FROM PULSE.ACCOUNT a
INNER JOIN PULSE.ACCOUNT_TEAM_MEMBER t on t.AccountId = a.Id
INNER JOIN PULSE.[USER] u on t.UserId = u.Id
LEFT JOIN  [STG].[TD_ACCOUNT] ta ON TRIM(a.TDLinx_number__c) = ta.TDLINX_OUTLET_CODE
WHERE a.Account_Status__c = 'ACTIVE'
AND t.IsDeleted = 'FALSE'
AND u.Discipline__c is not null
AND ta.TDLINX_OUTLET_CODE IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY a.TDLinx_number__c,
a.SGWS_number__c ,
a.[Name],
a.ShippingStreet,
a.ShippingCity,
a.ShippingState,
u.Discipline__c,
a.ShippingPostalCode,
a.Account_Status__c;
